page.title: 07DEEPING ST.JAMES NURSERY
page.content: There are 2 nurseries in Back-lane. We went to visit one of them.The man who owns the nursery has one large greenhouse which measures 3251.5 square metres.It is divided up into bays. The owner grows over 45 different varieties of bedding plants such as begonia,cineraria,alyssum,aster,and marigolds.When he has sold most of these he plants lettuce. He buys them in, each little plant growing in a separate block of soil.This year he is growing a variety called Selina which is named after a television news reader called Selina Scott. Planting begins in February.Usually the begonias come up first.After the bedding plants and lettuce the next crop is chrysanthemums.1985 has been the worst year for a long time with lots of dull weather and late frosts.
